definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Allaah is not like us, He does not need to sleep, eat or drink.
sentences.chinese: 安拉和我們不一樣，他不需要睡眠，飲食。

sentences.english: Rather a pilgrim is to supplicate Allah and ask Him whatever he desires.
sentences.chinese: 更正確的是朝覲者祈禱安拉，向安拉尋求自己的願望。

sentences.english: Rather a pilgrim is to supplicate Allah and ask Him whatever he desires.
sentences.chinese: 更正確的是朝覲者祈禱安拉，向安拉尋求自己的願望。

sentences.english: Aside of schadenfreude SuiYu, didnt also able to survive, Allah is often come in.
sentences.chinese: 一旁幸災樂禍的隋玉，也沒能倖免，被常安拉了進來。

sentences.english: I pray you would not ever have to do so.
sentences.chinese: 向貧困的人施捨，並祈求安拉承領你的施捨和祈禱。

sentences.english: Allah's Apostle and the people dismounted and dispersed to rest in the shade of the trees.
sentences.chinese: 安拉的使徒和人民下車，並分散在休息的樹蔭。

sentences.english: May Allah reward you and grant you forgiveness in this blessed month.
sentences.chinese: 願安拉獎賞你，在這個尊貴吉慶的齋月寬恕你。

sentences.english: When the Messenger of Allah came to Madinah, my father and my uncle went to see him.
sentences.chinese: 當安拉的使者來到麥地那時，我父親和我叔叔去看他。

sentences.english: Young people walk through the streets of Ramallah.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人走在拉姆安拉的大街上。

sentences.english: Paul's words, like the hadith qudsi, described forgiveness as a gift from God.
sentences.chinese: 保羅的話，就如同聖訓所述那樣，寬恕是安拉的恩賜。

sentences.english: For Allah, I determine to perform two rakaats of the Sunnah Fajr Prayer.
sentences.chinese: 我虔誠爲安拉進行晨禮的兩拜聖行拜。

sentences.english: They flocked to the open field by the hundreds to praise Allah.
sentences.chinese: 上百人聚集在開闊的空地上讚美“安拉”。

sentences.english: There is no God but Allah and Muhammed is his me enger.
sentences.chinese: 萬物非主，惟有真主，穆罕默德是安拉的使者。

sentences.english: I bear witness that there is no god but Allah. He is One; He has no partner.
sentences.chinese: 我作證無一是主，惟有安拉，衪獨一，無夥伴。

sentences.english: Believers know that all things are under Allah's control.
sentences.chinese: 信仰者們知道一切事情全歸安拉掌管。

sentences.english: Bush's trip to Ramallah produced plenty of happy talk.
sentences.chinese: 布什去拉姆安拉一事產生了衆多樂觀的談論。

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
